rivew.summary: Giovanni's Italia Fine Dinning is a completely restored Victorian stone house and offers a warm and elegant atmosphere and gracious service

item.name: Crab cakes
item.discription: With a creamy dill sauce with crispy herbed fries.
Garden vegtable soup with chocalte sauce.

item.name: Calamari Fritta
item.discription: Tender rings of squid, dusted in flour and lightly fried, served with sun-dried tomato aioli

item.name: Charcutterie Board
item.discription: Selection of cheese and cured meats served with a variety of breads and crostinis

item.name: House Specialty
item.discription: Pan seared chicken supreme with a sun-dried tomato pistachio pesto cream sauce, served with roasted potatoes and seasonal vegtables
Braised jumbo sea scallops on a sun-dried roast tomato base
Free-range chicken breast stuffed with morels in brandy sauce

item.name: Eggplant Pamigiana
item.discription: Fresh eggplant, thinly sliced and breaded, topped with tomato sauce and mozzerella cheese, baked golden brown. Served with linguine in tomato sauce.
roast pork loin on a bed of garlic ginger apple slaw

rivew.summary: testtesttestThe food is always consistent. A good variety of dim sum, sushi, Chinese and even Vietnamese dishes. The service is quick and the food is plentiful. We sat down last night and within seconds of turning in our first order, the plates were on the table! The teriyaki dishes had the right amount of sauce and weren't sickeningly sweet. The chicken, fish, and beef were perfectly cooked. The makirolls were neatly rolled, cut properly and seasoned well. Loved the General Tao chicken, the steamed BBQ pork buns, the eel sushi and the lovely eggplant. We will be going back again! I would highly recommend it.

item.name: Sweet and Sour Fish Catonese Style

rivew.summary: My favorite restaurant in Ottawa. The family who owns it are very warm and lovely people. They are incredible at recognizing you when you come back. The burritos are super good. You can customize however you want (guac is included!). I especially love that there is cactus in the veggie mix; it is a small, special thing that sets this place apart from other Mexican spots downtown.

item.name: Chips and Black Beans and Cheese
Sopa de Tortilla
item.discription: Tomato-based soup topped with homemade tortilla strips, sour cream, cheese, and avocado.

item.name: Consome de Pollo
item.discription: Chicken broth with rice, chickpeas, carrots, and shredded chicken, served with cilanto, onion avacado and lime.

item.name: Burrito
item.discription: Ten-inch flour tortilla filled with black beans, rice, lettuce, cheese, pico de gallo, guacamole, and choice of protein.

item.name: Burrito Combo
item.discription: Ten-inch flour tortilla filled with black beans, rice, lettuse, cheese, pico de gallo, guacamole, and choice of protein

item.name: Burrito Roja
item.discription: Ten-inch flour tortilla filled with Mexican rice, black beans, guacamole, and choice of protein. Beathed in Chilauile's homemade salsa roja.

item.name: Enchiladas
item.discription: Gluten friendly. Lightly sauteed corn tortillas, choice of filling, covered in Chikauile's homemade salsa verde or salsa roja, topped with onions.

item.name: Echiladas de Mole
item.discription: Gluten friendly. Lightly sauteed corn tortillas, choice of filling, covered in mole sauce, topped with onions, sour cream, and crumbled cheese.
